def_en: When people rebuild something such as a building or a city, they build it again after it has been damaged or destroyed.

def_cn: 重建，重组，复原（机构、制度或生活的某些方面）
def_en: When people rebuild something such as an institution, a system, or an aspect of their lives, they take action to bring it back to its previous condition.

def_cn: 复原，修复（身体某一部分）
def_en: If doctors rebuild part of someone's body that has been damaged, they operate on that person to make them well again.
